short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Horizon Collaborate Guest Client sharing extension to help the guest users in sharing desktop with the room attendees

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables a Horizon Collaborate guest to make their own screen shared to the other attendees in the meeting.
